epic.title: ProjectX - Order Management System
epic.description: Develop a comprehensive web application for managing customer orders, including order creation, tracking, and fulfillment

userStories.title: User Authentication and Authorization
userStories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in to the system so that I can access my orders and account information
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can log in with valid credentials
Password reset functionality is available
Role-based access control is implemented
Session management is secure

userStories.title: Create and Submit Orders
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to create and submit orders for products so that I can purchase items
acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse available products
Users can add products to cart
Users can specify quantity and options
Order summary is displayed before submission
Confirmation email is sent after order submission

userStories.title: View and Track Orders
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my order history and track current orders so that I know the status of my purchases
acceptanceCriteria: Users can view list of all their orders
Order details show items, quantities, and prices
Real-time order status is displayed
Tracking information is available for shipped orders
Users can filter and sort orders

userStories.title: Order Management for Administrators
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage all orders in the system so that I can fulfill customer requests
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can view all orders in the system
Admins can update order status
Admins can cancel or refund orders
Admins can generate order reports
Admins receive notifications for new orders

userStories.title: Product Catalog Management
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage the product catalog so that customers can order the correct items
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can add new products
Admins can update product details and pricing
Admins can set product availability
Products can have images and descriptions
Products can be categorized
